faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I book a service?
faq.a1: You can book our services by contacting us through phone, email, or filling out the contact form. We'll respond promptly to arrange your appointment.
faq.q2: What forms of payment do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept cash, major credit cards, and mobile payment methods. Payment is required before the service begins.
faq.q3: Can I upgrade my package during the session?
faq.a3: Yes, you can upgrade your package during your session if you wish to extend your time or add additional services, subject to availability.
faq.a4: Absolutely. We value your privacy and ensure complete discretion with all our services. Your personal information will never be shared.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I book an appointment?
faq.a1: You can book an appointment by filling out our contact form, calling us directly, or sending an email. We recommend booking at least 2 hours in advance for the best availability.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept cash payments in ETB or USD. For VIP packages, we also accept credit cards and mobile payment methods.
faq.a3: Absolutely. We take client confidentiality extremely seriously. Your personal information and visit details are never shared with third parties or made public.
